text: I was the one who taught you how to play basketball.
I was the one who taught you to dribble.
And I remember the first time you beat me at basketball
and I I was very upset and you said
if you remember correctly you said  "you just have to shake it off."

because we just we go back, you know what, 20 years.
Actually, we've never met and that's a fake story.
But I wish it were the truth.
You are amazing. You're the MVP.  I'm so happy for you.
Sending you the biggest hug ever.
